footer.disclaimer: Ehara tenei i te paetukutuku mana a te Kawanatanga. Mo etahi atu korero mo te COVID pass, haere ki https://nzcp.covid19.health.nz

header.Scan your NZ COVID pass: Matawai i to NZ COVID pass

invalidCodes.expired: Aroha mai, te ahua nei kua pau to COVID pass. Tena koa whakapā atu ki te [Manatū Hauora (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})
invalidCodes.invalid: Aroha mai, kaore i taea e matou te manatoko i to urunga COVID. Tena koa whakapā atu ki te [Manatū Hauora (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})
invalidCodes.notAcovidPass: Aroha mai, ehara tenei i te paahi COVID. Tena koa whakapā atu ki te [Manatū Hauora (Ministry of Health)]({{link}})

thisLanguage.callToAction: Whakamahia te vaxxed.as i te reo Māori
thisLanguage.name: Te reo Māori
